translation.source: The Endocrine System is a system of glands, each of which secretes a type of hormone directly into the bloodstream to regulate the body.

translation.source: Minerals: Minerals are naturally occurring useful substances that are neither plants nor animals

translation.source: Blood Vessels: Tubes that carry blood as it circulates. Arteries bring oxygenated blood from the heart and lungs; veins return oxygen-depleted blood back to the heart and lungs.

translation.source: The reproductive system or genital system: a system of organs within an organism which work together for the purpose of reproduction.

translation.source: Astronomers or paleontologists cannot experiment with distant stars or extinct dinosaurs, and social scientists cannot practically or ethically manipulate society.

translation.source: Lymph nodes: The lymph nodes function as an immunologic filter for the bodily fluid known as lymph. Lymph nodes are found throughout the body.
translation.target: Asẹ́ omi-ara: Àwọn asẹ́ omi-ara nṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́bí asẹ́ nípa mímú òkí-ara fún omi-ara. Àwọn asẹ omi-ara yi wà káàkiri ara pátápátá.

translation.source: An immune system is a system of biological structures and processes within an organism that protects against disease by identifying and killing pathogens and tumor cells.
translation.target: Eya òkí-ara jẹ́ àwọn ètò àti ìlànà nínú ẹ̀dá-oníyè tó nṣe ìdáàbò bo ara lọwọ àwọn àrùn nípa ṣiṣe àfihàn àti pípa àwọn ẹ̀yàwuuru afàìsàn àti àwọn pádi tó nfa lẹẹrẹ àti jẹjẹrẹ.

translation.source: Veins: Veins are blood vessel channels that carry waste-rich blood back to the lungs

Fífi ara gba àwọn nkan olóró

translation.source: Theory: A hypothesis repeatedly tested and never falsified becomes a theory

translation.source: In modern times, geology is commercially important for mineral and hydrocarbon exploration and for evaluating water resources;

translation.source: A gland selects and removes materials from the blood, processes them, and secretes the finished chemical product for use somewhere in the body.

translation.source: Helps in the identification of some diseases
translation.target: Ó nṣe ìrànlọwọ fún rírí ojúùtú àwọn àìsàn kan

translation.source: Ore : a naturally occurring solid material from which a metal or valuable mineral can be profitably extracted.

translation.source: Arteries: Arteries are muscular blood vessels that carry oxygenated blood away from the heart (except the pulmonary and umbilical arteries).

translation.source: These statements must be falsifiable – capable of being proven false.
translation.target: Niwọngbati a ba ti sọ pe ọna imọ-jinlẹ ni a ntọ, ko si arosọ kan ti a le ṣe ti a le sọ pe ko le ni ariyanjiyan ninu Abakaba ti a ba da tabi ọrọkọrọ ti a ba sọ ti a ko ba le janiyan tabi ki a wa irọ ti o le wa nidii rẹ ki i ṣe ti ilana imọ-jinlẹ.
